SecretAPIKeyScheme.name: Authorization
SecretAPIKeyScheme.description: Add your IntaSend Secret Key with prefix 'Bearer' to authenticate. It is prefixed with ISSecretKey_[env], [More info](https://developers.intasend.com/authentication),

PublickAPIKeyScheme.name: X-IntaSend-Public-API-Key
PublickAPIKeyScheme.description: Add your Public API key. It is prefixed with ISPubKey_[env]
